oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Entscheidungsbaum zur vorausschauenden Bekämpfung von Magen-Darm Würmern bei Wiederkäuern
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koopmann, Regine
Dämmrich , Michaela
Ploeger, Harm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Control of gastrointestinal worms is crucial to any pasture system for ruminants. To support the farmer's foresighted planning of pasturage and avoid excessive deworming four decision trees are created and put online. They are accessible free by www.weide-parasiten.de. There is one decision tree for young cattle in intensive dairy husbandry and young cattle in suckling-cow management as well as one decision tree for economically kept sheep and goats, respectively
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Koopmann, Regine; Dämmrich , Michaela and Ploeger, Harm (2013) Entscheidungsbaum zur vorausschauenden Bekämpfung von Magen-Darm Würmern bei Wiederkäuern. Poster at: 12. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Rheinische Friedrich-Wilhelms-Universität, Bonn, 5. bis 8. März 2013.
